p.s: Why Shakespeare should still be taught in English classes.
Shakespeare was not only a very talented author but also he made up over 700 new words for the English language.
Of course Shakespeare is written in 1600 which is over 400 years in the past, but his plays and sonnets still fill in the new time and still help a lot of people.
Also some very known sentences we use on a daily basis are lines Shakespeare made up in his plays or his sonnets.
For sure it could be difficult for students to understand the old texts and some of them maybe hate Shakespeare but it is some sort of knowledge which everybody should have.
Especially when we use his queotes on a daily basis.
To summerisesummarise all the arguments, I still am for Shakespeare in English classes although it is very old, you can learn something over your current language and over everything you do.
